cookieConsent.text: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.

success.thePaymentWasSuccessfull:
The payment was completed successfully.
You have charged $%amount%.

error.brushSizeMustBeBetween1and20: Brush size must be between 1 and 20
error.needToBeOnlineToUseThisFeature: You need to be online to enable this feature
error.thereWasAnErrorWithThePament: There was an error during payment. Please try again.
error.couldNotLoadModels: Could not load the models. Please try again later.
error.authorizationRequired: Authorization as Bearer(Auth) or Cookie(authKey) is required
error.noCreditsLeft: No credits left You have to buy more credits to use this feature.
error.notLoggedIn: You are not logged in. Please log in to use this feature.

confirm.doYouWantToDeleteImage: Do you want to delete the image?

chats.noChatsDesc: Start a new chat or search for someone

deleteAllChats.message: Are you sure you want to delete all chats?

lightDarkMode.title: Dark Mode
lightDarkMode.label: Enable Dark Mode
lightDarkMode.desc:
Enable Dark Mode
  • Consumes less power

stream.title: Stream
stream.label: Get the data in small chunks and display them immediately
stream.desc:
Stream the data from the server to the client
  • Result is faster readable
  • May consume more memory

oneChunk.title: In One Chunk
oneChunk.label: Get all data at once
oneChunk.desc:
Get all the data in one chunk
  • Consumes less memory
  • Result is slower readable

animateTyping.title: Typing Animation
animateTyping.label: Animate the AI typing
animateTyping.desc:
Show the typing animation
  • Looks better
  • May lag more
  • Is not compatible with dall⋅e 2, dall⋅e 3 and Streaming

maxMessageChatCount.title: Max Message Chat Count
maxMessageChatCount.label: Maximum Messages stored in Chat History
maxMessageChatCount.desc:
The maximum amount of messages that are loaded at once
  • Less memory consumption
  • Less cost

maxMessageLoadCount.title: Max Message Load Count
maxMessageLoadCount.label: Maximum Messages loaded from Server/Storage at once
maxMessageLoadCount.desc:
The maximum amount of messages that are loaded at once
  • Less memory consumption
  • More requests

maxMessageSendCount.title: Max Message Send Count
maxMessageSendCount.label: Maximum Messages send to Server in one Request
maxMessageSendCount.desc:
The maximum amount of messages that are send as chat history for the AI to remember things
  • Less memory consumption
  • May lag less
  • Less Mobile Data consumption
  • Less cost
  • AI remembers less

showProfileImage.title: Show Profile Image
showProfileImage.label: Show the Profile Image of the User and the AI
showProfileImage.desc:
Show the profile image of the user and the AI
  • Looks better
  • May lag more

offlineToggle.title: Chats without internet connection
offlineToggle.label: View the Chats without an internet connection
offlineToggle.desc:
View the Chats without an internet connection
  • No internet connection needed
  • consumes mor disc space
  • Not working when Chats are stored on the Server

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.label: Allow Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.desc:
Allow Google Analytics to track your usage
  • Helps to improve the service

Following Data is collected:
  • Model usage
